Game.Name: Bruce Lee - Return of the Legend (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: Bruce Lee plays the role of Hai Feng, a martial arts student out for revenge after the death of his master at the hands of the Yakan organisation. Playing out like a Bruce Lee movie, you can pull off all the famous moves that made Bruce Lee a star of the action genre between cut scenes that tell the compelling story, and fights set in original, yet familiar, landmarks.The side-scroller will have you fighting various enemies from left, right, above and below. Explore each level for various weapons, while completing tasks to complete the level (such as finding a certain amount of keys or rescuing hostages to defeating every enemy that is thrown at you). Use Bruce Lee's abilities to flipkick up ledges to higher ground or flip characters over your shoulder to knock out those behind you.Cheat: InvincibilityOn the select ''a slot screen'', hold L and tap down, down, R, R, up, up, select. Cheat: InvincibilityHold the L button while on the ''Select a Slot'' screen, and then press R, Up, R, Up, R, Up, R to give your character unlimited use of the weapons.Cheat: InvincibilityRight, Up, Down, R, Up, Select, Left unlocks the Dragon Outfit Right, Up, Up, R, R, Select, Left unlocks the Gold Outfit Right, Down, Down, R, R, Select, Left unlocks the Bruce Lee circa 1973 OutfitCheat: InvincibilityEnter these on the ''select a slot'' screen. Director's Cut: Hold L and tap up, R, select, R, up, select, select. Time Challenge: Hold L and tap up, down, up, R, up, down, select. Gallery: Hold L and tap down, up, down, R, R, select, left. Cheat: Directors cut modeTo unlock directors cut comeplete the game on ''normal''Cheat: Directors cut modeBruce '73: To unlock the Bruce '73 costume, unlock Director's cut mode. Dragon: To unlock the Dragon costume, beat the game on Director's cut mode.Cheat: Configure your own enemy listHold the L button while on the ''Select a Slot'' screen, and then enter a code below to produce the desired effect. Press Right, Left, Right, Left, Right, Left, Right to turn all enemies you will encounter into ''Big Thugs''. Press Up, Down, Left, Right, Up, Down, Left to turn all enemies you will encounter into ''Texases''. Press Right a total of six times to turn all enemies you will encounter into ''Jamals''. Press Up, Right, Down, R, R, Select, Left to randomize the enemy configuration. In other words, random enemies will be put in place of the usual bunch.
Game.Notes: The legendary Bruce Lee is back as Hai Feng! Master Bruce's fists of fury, nunchaku and dozens of awesome moves as you travel across the globe to locations of mystery and intrigue in this epic martial arts adventure! Use the environment to your advantage, evade your enemies by scaling walls, fight like the Masterwith multiple combo and power-up attacks.
